title: Dmitry Bashkevich
text: Dmitriy Valentinovich Bashkevich (; born 26 February 1968 in <a href="Tashkent">Tashkent</a>) is a retired <a href="Uzbekistan">Uzbekistan</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> of <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n descent who played for <a href="Uzbekistan%20national%20football%20team">Uzbekistani national team</a> in the <a href="1996%20Asian%20Cup">1996 Asian Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Semipalatinsk">Spartak Semipalatinsk</a>, <a href="FC%20Khimik">Khimik Dzhamboul</a>, <a href="Navbahor%20Namangan">Navbahor Namangan</a> and <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">Kuban Krasnodar</a>.
